lead_paragraph: Joe Calzaghe (45-0) earned a split-decision victory Saturday night in Las Vegas, rallying in the final rounds against Bernard Hopkins (48-5-1) to end his United States debut with a flourish. Judge Ted Gimza scored the bout, 115-112, for Calzaghe; Chuck Giampa favored Calzaghe, 116-111; Adelaide Byrd favored Hopkins, 114-113.
